structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS

law.text: All funds derived from taxes, service charges, sales or other income resulting from the operation of a waste management district shall if collected or held by another person be paid to and expended by the district to carry out its duties, functions, and responsibilities.
law.history: Amended 1982 Ky. Acts ch. 74, sec. 7, effective July 15, 1982. -- Created 1966 Ky. Acts ch. 66, sec. 14.
